channel.title: Help - my server is blocked
channel.description:
I have been doing game servers for some time. I have over 120,000 accounts on my rs2 server when suddenly it stoped working.
I tried formating, Then using a older backup I know works, I get no connections back to me.
My port is all set right, there perfect no questions asked.
I have no firewalls on at all, Not in Windows or my router.
I tried reseting the cable box, and the router, Still I get nuthing.
I tried some commands like ipconfig with /release and /renew.
I tried a different port.
To say the least something is blocking players from connecting. There was 1 player who can get on, no1 knows why he can get on.
I have tried everything I can think of, whats left to try??
Someone help me please. Thx from marco

item.title: Help - my server is blocked
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Don’t know, but what I do know is that if you upgrade to business class fios, then they let you setup things like that. It’s like $130 a month, which is bull.

Read full topic

item.description:

Yep. Verizon sucks =\I have it lol. Zolt, wouldnt he need a static IP?

item.title: Help - my server is blocked
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Wasn’t on-topic.

Did you switch to verizon? They block a port that doesn’t let incoming traffic connect.

Read full topic

Why would you want 120k accounts?
